name: Krallys
content:
Krallys the Wild was the name of an Acklay which escaped from the Coronet Zoo on Corellia in 3640 BBY and was subsequently killed.
Krallys appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Corellia. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
